user.title: Oclean Toothbrush (inofficial)
user.description: Set up your Oclean Smart Toothbrush. Nearby devices will be listed automatically if Bluetooth is enabled.

pick_device.title: Select Oclean Device
pick_device.description: Select the Oclean device to integrate.

manual.title: Manual Setup
manual.description: No Oclean devices were found nearby. Enter the MAC address of your Oclean toothbrush manually. You can find it in the official Oclean app under device settings.

data_description.mac_address: The Bluetooth MAC address of your Oclean toothbrush.
data_description.poll_interval: How often (in seconds) to poll the device. Minimum 60 s. Default: 300 s (5 min).

confirm.title: Confirm Oclean Device
confirm.description: Found Oclean device **{name}** ({mac}). Confirm to add it.

error.invalid_mac: Invalid MAC address format. Please use AA:BB:CC:DD:EE:FF.
error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the device. Make sure it is charged and nearby.

abort.already_configured: This Oclean device is already configured.

data_description.poll_interval: How often to poll the toothbrush over Bluetooth. Minimum 60 s.
data_description.post_brush_cooldown: Pause polling for this many hours after a new brushing session is detected. Set to 0 to disable.
data_description.window_count: Restrict polling to specific time windows (e.g. morning and evening brushing). Set to 0 to always poll.

window_1.title: Brushing Window 1
window_1.description: Define the first time window during which the toothbrush will be polled.

window_2.title: Brushing Window 2
window_2.description: Define the second time window during which the toothbrush will be polled.

window_3.title: Brushing Window 3
window_3.description: Define the third time window during which the toothbrush will be polled.

error.window_incomplete: Both start and end time must be set.
